main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Pineville, Louisiana on August 15, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as standing on one end and the size of a basketball; it flashed a light yellow color that changed to white under sunlight., The sighting lasted for approximately 1 minute., The observation was categorized as visual., The report included a conclusion suggesting it might be a balloon., Children were noted to have sighted the object while playing.
sighted object: object shaped like a standing basketball, yellow flashing to white
